body:
Hey guys. I decided to do a last AMA, because ya know...
Here is the people I would like to thank. 

Wobybender- You were my first friend on avicus, and we used to play a ton together. We haven't talked in 3 years but the old times were fun, and I wish you were still here.

Dawson- You introduced me to the competitive side of advices with my first team (Qrysis). We made lost of memories there and I had fun while it laster. Good luck in your future.

Hivu- We made a great team on Qrysis and played a lot together. I hope you come to Zildith.

Falz- You were great mod, and really nice to me when you were a junior. We had lots of conversations and you helped me out as a ref. 

PGaRo,Clickn,Finesse,timithy, gab, and nadone- You guys were all amazing people, and were fun to do the PGaRo thing with. Stay hot.

Porky- You won see this, but we used to talk back in 2015. I loved your videos, but was sad to see you leave. Good luck in life.

Squid and henry- It was really fun to play with you guys. We made a lot of good memories in Voicechats and online, and I hope you both play in the future still.

Devrevs- You were extremely friendly to me, and let me join team rocket for the last tournament as well as accepting me for social media. Thank you a lot.

Wolfi and Rilo- I don't even know where to start. You were my to best friends on this server, and were always active. We would stay up all night and talk about avi and stuff. Rilo thanks for building maps with me and teaching me how to world edit. Wolfi you were the funniest person on this server that I played with, and we played a lot of SMP together. I wish you both the best of luck in your futures.    

                                                                                                                                              Last but not least Xenarch- Thanks for helping me with my team and making me a better person. The whole experience was amazing, and it was fun to lead with coco and rilo. BOE II was really fun with you guys coming in 5th without winning any games.
Please ask any questions I will respond to anybody.

title: AMA Vior- bye :(
